org.bytedeco.ale

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.ale.Console
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=ale.class)
public class Console
extends Pointer
    This class represents the entire game console.

    Version:
    $Id: Console.hxx,v 1.61 2007/07/27 13:49:16 stephena Exp $
    Author:
    Bradford W. Mott

        public void initializeVideo(@Cast(value="bool")

        Initialize the video subsystem wrt this class. This is required for changing window size, title, etc.

        Parameters:
